Question: This person appeared in the 2012 Tarsem Singh adaptation of Snow White, called Mirror Mirror, playing the Evil Queen.
Hints: As of 2010, this person's net worth was estimated to be $140 million.
This person has been named one of People magazine's "50 Most Beautiful People in the World" eleven times, tied with Halle Berry.
This person disclosed in a 2010 interview for Elle magazine that she believes in and practices Hinduism.
